hibernate-mapping.query: from LcLinenType lclinenType where upper(lclinenType.linenTypeCode) like upper(:linenTypeCode) and upper(lclinenType.linenTypeDesc) like upper(:linenTypeDesc) and upper(lclinenType.effStatus) like upper(:effStatus)

from LcLinenItem lcLinenItem where upper(lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem) and upper(lcLinenItem.longDesc) like upper(:longDesc) and upper(lcLinenItem.shortDesc) like upper(:shortDesc) and upper(lcLinenItem.disposableItem) like upper(:disposable) and upper(lcLinenItem.effStatus) like upper(:effStatus)
select linenType.id.linenTypeCode,linenType.id.linenTypeDesc from LcLinenTypeLangVw as linenType where linenType.id.languageId like :languageId
from LcAgency lcAgency where upper(lcAgency.agencyCode) like upper(:agencyCode) and upper(lcAgency.agencyName) like upper(:agencyName) and upper(lcAgency.effStatus) like upper(:effStatus)

select lcAgency.id.agencyCode,lcAgency.id.agencyName from LcAgencyLangVw lcAgency where upper(lcAgency.id.agencyName) like upper(:description) and upper(lcAgency.id.agencyCode) like upper(:code) and lcAgency.id.languageId like :languageId

from LcReasonDtl dtl ,LcReason lcr where upper(dtl.id.lcReason.reasonCode) like upper(:reasonCode) and upper(dtl.id.lcReason.reasonDesc) like upper(:reasonDesc) and upper(dtl.id.lcReason.effStatus) like upper(:effStatus) and upper(lcr.reasonCode) like upper(dtl.id.lcReason.reasonCode)

from LcReasonDtl dtl where upper(dtl.id.lcReason.reasonCode) like upper(:reasonCode) and upper(dtl.id.lcReason.reasonDesc) like upper(:reasonDesc) and upper(dtl.id.lcReason.effStatus) like upper(:effStatus)

select lcReasonActionType.id.actionTypeCode,lcReasonActionType.id.actionTypeDesc from LcReasonActionTypeLangVw as lcReasonActionType where upper(lcReasonActionType.id.actionTypeDesc) like upper(:description) and upper(lcReasonActionType.id.actionTypeCode) like upper(:code) and lcReasonActionType.id.languageId like :languageId

select lcReasonActionVw.id.actionTypeCode,lcReasonActionVw.id.actionTypeDesc, lcReasonActionVw.id.activeYn from LcReasonActionVw lcReasonActionVw where lcReasonActionVw.id.reasonCode like :reasonCode and lcReasonActionVw.id.languageId like :languageId
select dtl.id.lcReason.reasonCode,dtl.id.lcReason.reasonDesc from LcReasonDtl as dtl
from LcUsers lcUsers where upper(lcUsers.id.laundryUserId) like upper(:user) and upper(lcUsers.overrideWardConf) like upper(:overRideWardConf)
select smApplUser.applUserId,smApplUser.applUserName from SmApplUser as smApplUser where upper(smApplUser.applUserName) like upper(:description) and upper(smApplUser.applUserId) like upper(:code)

select ip_ward.id.nursingUnitCode, ip_ward.id.shortDesc from IpNursingUnitLangVw as ip_ward where ip_ward.id.effStatus ='E' and upper(ip_ward.id.shortDesc ) like upper(:description) and upper(ip_ward.id.nursingUnitCode) like upper(:code) and ip_ward.id.facilityId like :facilityId and ip_ward.id.languageId like :languageId

select amDept.id.deptCode,amDept.id.shortDesc from AmDeptLangVw as amDept where amDept.id.effStatus ='E' and upper(amDept.id.shortDesc) like upper(:description) and upper(amDept.id.deptCode) like upper(:code) and amDept.id.languageId like :languageId

select opClinic.id.clinicCode, opClinic.id.shortDesc from OpClinicLangVw as opClinic where opClinic.id.effStatus ='E' and upper(opClinic.id.shortDesc) like upper(:description) and upper(opClinic.id.clinicCode) like upper(:code) and opClinic.id.facilityId like :facilityId and opClinic.id.languageId like :languageId

select lcLinenItem.id.linenItem,lcLinenItem.id.shortDesc from LcLinenItemLangVw as lcLinenItem where upper(lcLinenItem.id.shortDesc) like upper(:description) and upper(lcLinenItem.id.linenItem) like upper(:code) and lcLinenItem.id.effStatus ='E' and lcLinenItem.id.languageId like :languageId

from LcStdLinenStkDtl lcStdLinenStkDtl where upper(lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcStdLinenStkHdr.id.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcStdLinenStkHdr.id.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode)

select lcStdLinenQty.id.shortDesc ,lcStdLinenQty.id.linenItem,lcStdLinenQty.id.stdQty from LcStdLinenQtyVw lcStdLinenQty where lcStdLinenQty.id.operatingFacilityId like :facilityId and lcStdLinenQty.id.sourceType like :sourceType and lcStdLinenQty.id.sourceCode like :sourceCode and lcStdLinenQty.id.languageId like :languageId

select to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinRecptTo,'HH24:MI'),to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinRecpt2To,'HH24:MI') ,to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinRecpt3To,'HH24:MI'),to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinenDelv,'HH24:MI'),to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinenDelv2,'HH24:MI'),to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinenDelv3,'HH24:MI'),lcParamForFacility.cutOfDaysForLinenDelv,lcParamForFacility.cutOfDaysForLinenDelv2,lcParamForFacility.cutOfDaysForLinenDelv3,lcParamForFacility.noOfcutOfTimings from LcParamForFacility lcParamForFacility where lcParamForFacility.operatingFacilityId like :facilityId

from LcRequestDtl lcRequestDtl where upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceCode) like upper(:srcCode) and to_date(to_char(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.requestDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:requestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:toRequestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.raisedBy) like upper(:raisedBy) and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.requestStatus) like upper(:requestStatus) and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

from LcRequestDtl lcRequestDtl where upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceCode) like upper(:srcCode) and to_date(to_char(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.requestDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:requestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:toRequestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.raisedBy) like upper(:raisedBy) and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

from LcRequestDtl lcRequestDtl where upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceCode) like upper(:srcCode) and to_date(to_char(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.requestDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:requestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:toRequestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.raisedBy) like upper(:raisedBy) and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.requestStatus) in ('OS','PI') and upper(lcRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

select lcLinen.id.linenItem,lcLinen.id.shortDesc from LcStdLinenStkDtl lcStdLinenStkDtl,LcLinenItemLangVw lcLinen where lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = lcLinen.id.linenItem and lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcStdLinenStkHdr.id.sourceType like :sourceType and lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcStdLinenStkHdr.id.sourceCode like :sourceCode and upper(lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:code) and upper(lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc) like upper(:description) and lcLinen.id.languageId like :languageId

select lcLinen.id.linenItem,lcLinen.id.shortDesc from LcLaundryStk lcLaundryStk,LcLinenItemLangVw lcLinen where lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = lcLinen.id.linenItem and upper(lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:code) and upper(lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc) like upper(:description) and lcLinen.id.languageId like :languageId

select a.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc,a.requestedQty,b.remarks,b.issuedQty from LcRequestDtl a,LcIssueDtl b where upper(a.id.lcRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingfacilityId) and upper(a.id.lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum) like upper(:requestNo) and a.id.lcRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId= b.id.lcIssueHdr.id.operatingFacilityId(+) and a.id.lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum = b.requestNum(+) and a.id.lcLinenItem=b.id.lcLinenItem(+) and upper(a.id.lcLinenItem) like upper(:linenItem)

select a.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc,a.requestedQty,a.remarks from LcRequestDtl a where upper(a.id.lcRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingfacilityId) and upper(a.id.lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum) like upper(:requestNo) and upper(a.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem)

select reasonlang.id.reasonDesc,reasonlang.id.reasonCode from LcReasonLangVw reasonlang where upper(reasonlang.id.reasonCode) like upper(:code) and upper(reasonlang.id.reasonDesc) like upper(:description) and reasonlang.id.languageId like :language_Id
select lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum,lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum from LcRequestHdr as lcRequestHdr where lcRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId like upper(:facilityId)

select lcRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem,lcRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc from LcRequestDtl lcRequestDtl where lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum like :requestNo and lcRequestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId like :operatingFacilityId

select lcIssueDtl.requestNum,sum(lcIssueDtl.issuedQty) from LcIssueDtl lcIssueDtl where lcIssueDtl.id.lcIssueHdr.id.operatingFacilityId like :facilityId and lcIssueDtl.requestNum like :requestNo and lcIssueDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem like :linenItem group by lcIssueDtl.requestNum
select lcParamForFacility.operatingFacilityId,lcParamForFacility.stdStockChk from LcParamForFacility lcParamForFacility where lcParamForFacility.operatingFacilityId like :facilityId
select lcIssueHdr.id.issueNum,lcIssueHdr.id.issueNum from LcIssueHdr lcIssueHdr

select reqdtl.id.lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum,sum(reqdtl.requestedQty) from LcRequestDtl reqdtl where reqdtl.id.lcRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and reqdtl.id.lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum = :requestNum group by reqdtl.id.lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum

select issuedtl.id.lcIssueHdr.requestNum,sum(issuedtl.issuedQty) from LcIssueDtl issuedtl where issuedtl.id.lcIssueHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and issuedtl.id.lcIssueHdr.requestNum = :requestNum group by issuedtl.id.lcIssueHdr.requestNum

from LcCleaningRequestDtl lcCleaningRequestDtl where upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode) and to_date(to_char(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.requestDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:requestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:toRequestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.linenHandedOverBy) like upper(:linenHandedOverBy) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.linenCollectedBy) like upper(:linenCollectedBy) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.requestStatus) like upper(:requestStatus) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.category) like upper(:category) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.countConfirmedYn) like upper(:countConfirmedYn)

from LcCleaningRequestDtl lcCleaningRequestDtl where upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode) and to_date(to_char(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.requestDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:requestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:toRequestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.linenHandedOverBy) like upper(:linenHandedOverBy) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.linenCollectedBy) like upper(:linenCollectedBy) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.requestStatus) in ('OS','PD') and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.category) like upper(:category) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.countConfirmedYn) like upper(:countConfirmedYn)

select lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc, lcCleaningRequestDtl.remarks, lcCleaningRequestDtl.requestedQty, lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.deliveredQty, lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.deliveryDate, lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.lateDeliveryReason from LcCleaningRequestDtl lcCleaningRequestDtl,LcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl where upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum) like upper(:requestNo) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingFacilityId) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem)

select lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc, lcCleaningRequestDtl.remarks, lcCleaningRequestDtl.requestedQty from LcCleaningRequestDtl lcCleaningRequestDtl where upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum) like upper(:requestNo) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingFacilityId)
select lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum,lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum from LcCleaningRequestHdr as lcCleaningRequestHdr where lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId= :facility
select to_char(sysdate+1,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_char(sysdate+1,'dd/mm/yyyy') from LcParamForFacility paramFacility where paramFacility.operatingFacilityId= :facilityId

select lcParamForFacility.confReqdForDirtyLinen,to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinenDelv,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI') from LcParamForFacility as lcParamForFacility where lcParamForFacility.operatingFacilityId= :facilityId

select lcParamForFacility.dirtyLinenEntryByLaundry,to_char(lcParamForFacility.cutOffTimeForLinRecptTo,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI') from LcParamForFacility as lcParamForFacility where lcParamForFacility.operatingFacilityId= :facilityId

select lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem, lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc, lcLaundryStk.inCleaningQty from LcLaundryStk lcLaundryStk where upper(lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like nvl(upper(:linenItem),'%') and upper(lcLaundryStk.id.operatingFacilityId)like upper(:facilityId) and lcLaundryStk.inCleaningQty > 0
select lcCleanedLinenHdr.id.cleaningRefNum,lcCleanedLinenHdr.id.cleaningRefNum from LcCleanedLinenHdr as lcCleanedLinenHdr

select lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum,sum(lcCleaningRequestDtl.requestedQty) from LcCleaningRequestDtl lcCleaningRequestDtl where lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum = :requestNum group by lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum

select lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.requestNum,sum(lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.deliveredQty) from LcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl where lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.id.lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.requestNum = :requestNum group by lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.requestNum
select lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.id.deliveryRefNum,lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.id.deliveryRefNum from LcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr

select lcCleaningRequestDtl.requestedQty,to_char(lcCleaningRequestDtl.schdDeliveryDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') from LcCleaningRequestDtl lcCleaningRequestDtl where lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId= :facilityId and lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum= :requestNum and lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.category = :category and lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem= :linenItem

select lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.requestNum,sum(lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.deliveredQty) from LcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl where lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.id.lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.id.operatingFacilityId like :facilityId and lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.requestNum like :requestNo and lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem like :linenItem group by lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.requestNum

select lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc, lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.remarks, lcCleaningRequestDtl.requestedQty, lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.deliveredQty, lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.deliveryDate, lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.lateDeliveryReason from LcCleaningRequestDtl lcCleaningRequestDtl,LcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl where upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem) and lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum like :requestNo and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingFacilityId) and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) = upper(lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.id.lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) and lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum = lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.requestNum and upper(lcCleaningRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) = upper(lcCleanedLinenDeliveryDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem)
select dept.id.deptCode,dept.id.longDesc from AmDeptLangVw dept where nvl(dept.id.effStatus,'E') ='E'
select lcUser.id.laundryUserId,lcUser.id.laundryUserId from LcUsers lcUser where lcUser.id.operatingFacilityId =:facility and lcUser.id.laundryUserId=:laundryUserId
select appluser.applUserName,appluser.applUserName from SmApplUser appluser where appluser.applUserId = :userId
select reasonlang.id.reasonDesc,reasonlang.id.reasonCode from LcReasonLangVw reasonlang where reasonlang.id.actionTypeCode ='3' and reasonlang.id.languageId like :language_Id
select reasonlang.id.reasonDesc,reasonlang.id.reasonCode from LcReasonLangVw reasonlang where reasonlang.id.actionTypeCode ='4' and reasonlang.id.languageId like :language_Id
select reasondtl.id.reasonDesc,reasondtl.id.reasonCode from LcReasonLangVw reasondtl where reasondtl.id.actionTypeCode ='1' and reasondtl.id.activeYn='Y' and reasondtl.id.languageId like :language_Id
from LcSourceStk lcSourceStk where upper(lcSourceStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem)
from LcSourceStk lcSourceStk where upper(lcSourceStk.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode)

select lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem, lcLaundryStk.withLaundryQty, lcLaundryStk.issuedOutQty, lcLaundryStk.inCleaningQty, lcLaundryStk.inMendingQty, lcLaundryStk.withLaundryQty from LcLaundryStk lcLaundryStk where lcLaundryStk.id.operatingFacilityId =:facilityId and lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem =:linenItem
select writeOff.id.writeOffRefNum,writeOff.id.writeOffRefNum from LcWriteOff writeOff where writeOff.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId

select laundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem, nvl(laundryStk.withLaundryQty,0),nvl(laundryStk.inCleaningQty,0), nvl(laundryStk.inMendingQty,0) from LcLaundryStk laundryStk where laundryStk.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and laundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = :linenItem
select lcUsers.id.laundryUserId,lcUsers.id.laundryUserId from LcUsers lcUsers where lcUsers.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcUsers.id.laundryUserId = :userId

select sourceStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem, sourceStk.inUseQty,sourceStk.soiledQty,sourceStk.loanedQty from LcSourceStk sourceStk where sourceStk.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and sourceStk.sourceType = :sourceType and sourceStk.sourceCode = :sourceCode and sourceStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = :linenItem
select reasondtl.id.reasonDesc,reasondtl.id.reasonCode from LcReasonLangVw reasondtl where reasondtl.id.actionTypeCode ='7' and reasondtl.id.activeYn='Y' and reasondtl.id.languageId like :languageId

select lcItem.id.shortDesc, nvl(laundryStk.withLaundryQty,0) from LcLaundryStk laundryStk,LcLinenItemLangVw lcItem where laundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = lcItem.id.linenItem and laundryStk.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcItem.id.languageId = :language_Id

select lcItem.id.shortDesc, nvl(laundryStk.inCleaningQty,0) from LcLaundryStk laundryStk,LcLinenItemLangVw lcItem where laundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = lcItem.id.linenItem and laundryStk.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcItem.id.languageId = :language_Id

select lcItem.id.shortDesc, sum(reqCleaningDtl.requestedQty) from LcCleaningRequestDtl reqCleaningDtl, LcLinenItemLangVw lcItem where reqCleaningDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = lcItem.id.linenItem and reqCleaningDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and reqCleaningDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.sourceType =:sourceType and reqCleaningDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.sourceCode =nvl(:source,reqCleaningDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.sourceCode) and reqCleaningDtl.id.lcCleaningRequestHdr.requestStatus in ('OS','PD') and lcItem.id.languageId = :language_Id group by lcItem.id.shortDesc

select lcItem.id.shortDesc, sum(requestDtl.requestedQty) from LcRequestDtl requestDtl,LcLinenItemLangVw lcItem where requestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = lcItem.id.linenItem and requestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and requestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceType =:sourceType and requestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceCode =nvl(:source,requestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.sourceCode) and requestDtl.id.lcRequestHdr.requestStatus in ('OS','PI') and lcItem.id.languageId = :language_Id group by lcItem.id.shortDesc
select lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum,lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum from LcMendingRequestHdr as lcMendingRequestHdr

from LcMendingRequestDtl lcMendingRequestDtl where to_date(to_char(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.requestDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:requestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:toRequestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.lcAgency.agencyCode) like upper(:agencyCode) and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.requestStatus) in ('OS','PR') and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

from LcMendingRequestDtl lcMendingRequestDtl where to_date(to_char(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.requestDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:requestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:toRequestDate,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.lcAgency.agencyCode) like upper(:agencyCode) and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.sentBy) like upper(:sentBy) and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

select lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc, lcMendingRequestDtl.remarks, lcMendingRequestDtl.requestedQty from LcMendingRequestDtl lcMendingRequestDtl where upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem) like upper(:linenItem) and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum) like upper(:requestNo) and upper(lcMendingRequestDtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingFacilityId)

select a.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc,b.id.remarks,a.requestedQty,b.id.receivedQty from LcMendingRequestDtl a,LcMendingReceiptDtl b where upper(a.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingfacilityId) and upper(a.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum) like upper(:requestNo) and a.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId= b.id.lcMendingReceiptHdr.id.operatingFacilityId and a.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum = b.id.requestNum and a.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem=b.id.linenItem
select lcMendingReceiptHdr.id.receiptNum,lcMendingReceiptHdr.id.receiptNum from LcMendingReceiptHdr as lcMendingReceiptHdr

select lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.requestNum,sum(lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.receivedQty) from LcMendingReceiptDtl lcMendingReceiptDtl where lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.lcMendingReceiptHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.requestNum = :requestNum group by lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.requestNum

select reqdtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum,sum(reqdtl.requestedQty) from LcMendingRequestDtl reqdtl where reqdtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and reqdtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum = :requestNum group by reqdtl.id.lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum

select lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.requestNum,sum(lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.receivedQty) from LcMendingReceiptDtl lcMendingReceiptDtl where lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.lcMendingReceiptHdr.id.operatingFacilityId like :facilityId and lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.linenItem like :linenItem and lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.requestNum like :requestNum group by lcMendingReceiptDtl.id.requestNum
select lcComplaintHdr.id.complaintNum,lcComplaintHdr.id.complaintNum from LcComplaintHdr lcComplaintHdr where upper(lcComplaintHdr.id.operatingFacilityId) like (:facilityId)
select lcComplaintDtl.id.refRequestNum,lcComplaintDtl.id.refRequestNum from LcComplaintDtl lcComplaintDtl
select reasondtl.id.reasonDesc,reasondtl.id.reasonCode from LcReasonLangVw reasondtl where reasondtl.id.actionTypeCode ='8' and reasondtl.id.activeYn='Y' and reasondtl.id.languageId like :language_Id
select reasondtl.id.reasonDesc,reasondtl.id.reasonCode from LcReasonLangVw reasondtl where reasondtl.id.actionTypeCode ='9' and reasondtl.id.activeYn='Y' and reasondtl.id.languageId like :language_Id
select lcLinenReturnHdr.id.refNum, lcLinenReturnHdr.id.refNum from LcLinenReturnHdr as lcLinenReturnHdr

select stk.id.lcLinenItem.shortDesc,stk.inUseQty from LcSourceStk stk where stk.id.operatingFacilityId = :facility and stk.sourceType =:sourType and stk.sourceCode = :source and stk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem =:linenItem
select lcLinenItem.id.linenItem,lcLinenItem.id.shortDesc from LcLinenItemLangVw as lcLinenItem where lcLinenItem.id.effStatus ='E' and lcLinenItem.id.languageId like :languageId
select lcRequestHdr.id.requestNum,to_char(lcRequestHdr.requestDate,'dd/MM/yyyy hh24:mi') from LcRequestHdr lcRequestHdr
select lcCleaningRequestHdr.id.requestNum,to_char(lcCleaningRequestHdr.requestDate,'dd/MM/yyyy hh24:mi') from LcCleaningRequestHdr lcCleaningRequestHdr
select lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.id.deliveryRefNum,to_char(lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.deliveryDate,'dd/MM/yyyy hh24:mi') from LcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr
select lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.id.deliveryRefNum,to_char(lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr.deliveryDate,'dd/MM/yyyy hh24:mi') from LcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr lcCleanedLinenDeliveryHdr
select lcMendingRequestHdr.id.requestNum,to_char(lcMendingRequestHdr.requestDate,'dd/MM/yyyy hh24:mi') from LcMendingRequestHdr lcMendingRequestHdr
select lcMendingReceiptHdr.id.receiptNum,to_char(lcMendingReceiptHdr.receiptDate,'dd/MM/yyyy hh24:mi') from LcMendingReceiptHdr lcMendingReceiptHdr
select lcLoanDtls.id.loanRefNum,lcLoanDtls.id.loanRefNum from LcLoanDtls lcLoanDtls
select reasondtl.id.lcReason.reasonDesc,reasondtl.id.lcReason.reasonCode from LcReasonDtl reasondtl where reasondtl.id.lcReasonActionType.actionTypeCode ='5' and reasondtl.activeYn='Y'

from LcLoanDtls lcLoanDtls where upper(lcLoanDtls.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcLoanDtls.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanedToSourceType) like upper(:loanedToSourceType) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanedToSourceCode) like upper(:loanedToSourceCode) and to_date(to_char(lcLoanDtls.loanDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:loanDateFrom,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:loanDateTo,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcLoanDtls.givenBy) like upper(:givenBy) and upper(lcLoanDtls.receivedBy) like upper(:receivedBy) and upper(lcLoanDtls.reasonForLoan) like upper(:reasonForLoanCode) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanStatus) in ('OS','L') and upper(lcLoanDtls.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

from LcLoanDtls lcLoanDtls where upper(lcLoanDtls.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcLoanDtls.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanedToSourceType) like upper(:loanedToSourceType) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanedToSourceCode) like upper(:loanedToSourceCode) and to_date(to_char(lcLoanDtls.loanDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:loanDateFrom,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:loanDateTo,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcLoanDtls.givenBy) like upper(:givenBy) and upper(lcLoanDtls.receivedBy) like upper(:receivedBy) and upper(lcLoanDtls.reasonForLoan) like upper(:reasonForLoanCode) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanStatus) like upper(:requestStatus) and upper(lcLoanDtls.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

from LcLoanDtls lcLoanDtls where upper(lcLoanDtls.sourceType) like upper(:sourceType) and upper(lcLoanDtls.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanedToSourceType) like upper(:loanedToSourceType) and upper(lcLoanDtls.loanedToSourceCode) like upper(:loanedToSourceCode) and to_date(to_char(lcLoanDtls.loanDate,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') between to_date(replace(:loanDateFrom,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and to_date(replace(:loanDateTo,'%',''),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') and upper(lcLoanDtls.givenBy) like upper(:givenBy) and upper(lcLoanDtls.receivedBy) like upper(:receivedBy) and upper(lcLoanDtls.reasonForLoan) like upper(:reasonForLoanCode) and upper(lcLoanDtls.linenItem) like upper(:linnenItem)

select b.shortDesc,a.loanQty,a.receivedQty from LcLoanDtls a,LcLinenItem b where a.linenItem = b.linenItem and upper(a.id.operatingFacilityId) like upper(:operatingfacilityId) and upper(a.id.loanRefNum) like upper(:loanRefNum)
select mpPatient.patientId,mpPatient.patientName from MpPatient mpPatient

select lineneItem.linenItem,lcSourceStk.sourceCode,lcSourceStk.inUseQty,lcSourceStk.loanedQty,lcSourceStk.soiledQty from LcSourceStk lcSourceStk ,LcLinenItem lineneItem where lcSourceStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = lineneItem.linenItem and lineneItem.linenItem like upper(:linenItem)
from LcSourceStk lcSourceStk where upper(lcSourceStk.sourceCode) like upper(:sourceCode)

select lcStdLinenStkDtl.stdQty,lcStdLinenStkDtl.stdQty from LcStdLinenStkDtl lcStdLinenStkDtl where lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcStdLinenStkHdr.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcStdLinenStkHdr.id.sourceType = :sourceType and lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcStdLinenStkHdr.id.sourceCode = :sourceCode and lcStdLinenStkDtl.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = :linenItem

select lcSourceStk.inUseQty,lcSourceStk.soiledQty,lcSourceStk.loanedQty from LcSourceStk lcSourceStk where lcSourceStk.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcSourceStk.sourceType = :sourceType and lcSourceStk.sourceCode = :sourceCode and lcSourceStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = :linenItem

select lcLaundryStk.inCleaningQty, lcLaundryStk.withLaundryQty from LcLaundryStk lcLaundryStk where lcLaundryStk.id.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId and lcLaundryStk.id.lcLinenItem.linenItem = :linenItem
select lcParamForFacility.stdStockChk,lcParamForFacility.stdStockChk from LcParamForFacility as lcParamForFacility where lcParamForFacility.operatingFacilityId = :facilityId
select lcLaundryReceipts.id.receiptNum, lcLaundryReceipts.id.receiptNum from LcLaundryReceipts as lcLaundryReceipts where lcLaundryReceipts.id.operatingFacilityId = upper(:facilityId)
